description: This file contains C source code implementing a platform-independent utility function for creating a TLS HsoServer object, including licensing information, documentation, and the implementation of the TlsCreateHsoServer function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE TlsCreateHsoServer(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new TLS HsoServer object, taking container, owner, and reserved context handles as parameters.
